name: Klepto Planet Attack
description:
Klepto Planet Attack is a fast paced local multiplayer game. The goal is to collect as many toys on your home planet as you can before time runs out. Boost into toys to send them flying through space and hit them back to your home. Jump between planets to maneuver through the map and collect more toys, or even sabotage your opponent by hitting the toys off their planet.

Credits:
Francis Braxton - Programming, 3D modeling
Kelvin O'Brien Hamilton - 3D modeling
Lorne Hawke - Programming, 3D modeling
